topics.body:
Soooo somehow I made a complete ass out of myself and I don't understand how.

If you're wondering how I've been trying to start back up the gsa at my school.  In order to start back up a club you have to have several members already.  The problem with trying to start up a gsa is this is Texas; even though this is a pretty liberal school most glbt come from not exactly accepting families.  So what I have been trying to do is get people I definitely know are glbt to help sign. . . Well today I found someone that's ftm, but I tried metaphorically reaching out to them and asked them and they got offended.  I know a lot of people come from shit families, but it just feels weird at someone else that is trans to get offended at someone being accepting of them.  He probably had a extremely shitty family :\
